participant_1.background:
I love caring for people.
I have two dogs and one cat.
I love to ride my bike.
I work as a nurses aide in a nursing home.
I have three grown children and six grandchildren.

participant_2.background:
I drive a volkswagen beetle.
I am 17 years old and a senior in high school.
I am going to auburn university next year as a freshman.
I want to be a doctor when i grow up.
I love shopping fashion and clothes.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love shopping for fashion and clothes!
That's cool! I like to ride my bike.
That's a great way to get exercise.
Yeah, it is! I also love caring for people. I work as a nurses aide in a nursing home.
Wow, that's really admirable! I'm sure you make a big difference in the lives of your patients.
Thank you! I try my best. I love working with people and helping them in any way I can.
That's great to hear. I'm sure you're a wonderful asset to your team.
Thank you! I'm so glad I have the opportunity to do what I love for a living.
That's really great! What's your favorite thing about working as a nurses aide?
I love getting to know my patients and building relationships with them. It's so rewarding to see them make progress and improve their quality of life.
That's so great! I'm sure it's a very rewarding job.
It is! I love being able to make a difference in people's lives.
That's amazing. I'm sure you're a great nurses aide.
Thank you! I try my best
